recipesJson.name: F.M.R (First Mix Remix) Bavarian Cream Donut!
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description: For Fresh03's show today, we went back to our first posted mix, to remix it. My first mix was a bavarian cream donut. There are a few new flavors that work very well here! I like around .25% super sweet, I don't list it, sweeten to taste.

pageContext.name: F.M.R (First Mix Remix) Bavarian Cream Donut!
